member.name: T:OpenNETCF.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer
member.summary: Serializes and deserializes objects into and from XML documents. The OpenNETCF.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer enables you to control how objects are encoded into XML.

member.name: M:OpenNETCF.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.#ctor(System.Type)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer class that can serialize objects of the specified type into XML documents, and vice versa.
member.param: The type of the object that this OpenNETCF.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer can serialize.

member.name: M:OpenNETCF.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.Serialize(System.Xml.XmlTextWriter,System.Object)
member.summary: Serializes the specified System.Object and writes the XML document to a file using the specified System.Xml.XmlWriter.
member.param: The System.xml.XmlWriter used to write the XML document.

member.name: M:OpenNETCF.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.Serialize(System.IO.TextWriter,System.Object)
member.summary: Serializes the specified System.Object and writes the XML document to a file using the specified System.IO.TextWriter.
member.param: The System.IO.TextWriter used to write the XML document.

member.name: M:OpenNETCF.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.Serialize(System.IO.Stream,System.Object)
member.summary: Serializes the specified System.Object and writes the XML document to a file using the specified System.IO.Stream.
member.param: The System.IO.Stream used to write the XML document.

member.name: M:OpenNETCF.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.SerializeGraph(System.Xml.XmlTextWriter,System.Object)
member.summary: Recursive internal method that loops through the object's properties and builds an XML tree.
member.param: The XmlTextWriter used to build the XML tree.

member.name: T:OpenNETCF.Xml.XPath
member.summary: Replicate the some Functionality of Xpath for Compact Framework.

member.name: M:OpenNETCF.Xml.XPath.SelectNodes(System.Xml.XmlNode,System.String)
member.summary: Selects child nodes from a parent node satisfying the xpath

member.name: M:OpenNETCF.Xml.XPath.GetChildNodeFromParent(System.Xml.XmlNode,System.String)
member.summary: Gets Child Node for a Parent node.
member.param: xpath expression of the Child XmlNode
